# Twind Plugin for Cloudflare Pages

![Built with Pages Plugins](https://img.shields.io/static/v1?labelColor=white&label=Built&color=F38020&url=https://pages.cloudflare.com&style=for-the-badge&message=With%20Pages%20Plugins&logo=data:image/svg+xml;base64,)

Built as a proof-of-concept for **Cloudflare Pages Plugins**. Demo available [here](https://twind-plugin.pages.dev/).

While this plugin will probably not be very useful to most people, it serves as a testament to the power of plugins in Cloudflare Pages. If you want to use this as a starting point for your own plugin, or use it in your own project, feel free to do so, provided you follow the terms set out in the [License](LICENSE).

Built & Maintained with ❤️ by [@helloimalastair](https://www.goalastair.com).
